content: row 18 *p13 k3 yarn forward slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k5 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops k3 repeat from * row 19 *p3 lpcdec p1 rpcdec p3 k13 repeat from * row 20 *p13 k13 repeat from * row 21 *p6 mb p6 k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk repeat from * row 22 *p13 k13 repeat from * row 23 *p5 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p1 kwrp2 yo kwrp2 into next st 5 loops on needle p5 k13 repeat from * row 24 *p13 k5 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops wyif p1 slip 3 sts onto rh needle dropping the extra loops wyif k5 repeat from * row 25 *p3 rpcdec p1 lpcdec p3 k4tog yo k1 5 times yo ssssk repeat from * row 26-28 *p13 k13 repeat from * page 5 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket directions with edging needle cast on 122 148 174 sts to make a larger or smaller width blanket simple cast on fewer or less sts by a multiple of 26 each multiple of 26 will add or subtract approximately 6 / 15 cm to the blanket measurement knit 14 row switch to main needle begin working the stitch pattern row 1 rs sl1 k8 work row 1 of stitch pattern over 104 130 156 sts k9 row 2 ws sl1 k8 work row 2 of stitch pattern over 104 130 156 sts k9 continue in the pattern through row 12 keeping the outside 9 sts on each side in garter stitch and slipping the first st of every row to create a nice edge row 13 and 14 work 2 short row at the beginning of row 13 and 14 to adjust for the slight difference in row gauge between garter stitch and the stitch pattern as follows short row 1 sl1 k8 turn mds k9 row 13 sl1 k8 resolve ds when you come to it work row 13 over 104 130 156 sts k9 short row 2 k8 turn mds k7 row 14 sl1 k8 resolve ds when you come to it work row 14 over 104 130 156 sts k9 continue in pattern through row 26 keep the outside 9 sts on each side in garter st and slipping the first st of every row to create a nice edge row 27-28 work short row at the beginning of these row as for row 13 and 14 repeat the 28 row of the stitch pattern 5 5 7 more times or to desired blanket length less 1 ½ as you work continue to make short row before row 13 14 27 and 28 of the stitch pattern on every repeat switch to edging needle knit 14 row bind off loosely finishing block lightly to measurements and weave in ends
